title: Is BYJU coaching good for school students who are currently in class 8th, 9th, and 10th? Please give suitable answers. - Quora

response.answer_text: I think no because one time I borrow byju for one year it takes 17000 and it take 1week for dilivery and when it come then I stated it then the video not working and tab also hanging .and I was thinking what happened .And in Mobile there is no area for sim so I return it mentor are also not good .and I buy meritnation only in 8,000 with online lecture and live tution . So by experiencing both I will say you you should buy meritnation classes . Best of luck
